header.rec_loc: In the car driving to North London from East London
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Cars, family, TLS, digital Vs print, traffic, road rage, work, France, presents, driving
header.activity: Mother and son talking in the car while doing an errand
header.conv_type: discussing, explaining, inquiring, announcing, anecdote telling
